sn2.4:1: Sāvatthinidānaṁ. Ekamantaṁ ṭhito kho māgadho devaputto bhagavantaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn2.4:2: "Kati lokasmiṁ pajjotā,yehi loko pakāsati;Bhavantaṁ puṭṭhumāgamma,kathaṁ jānemu taṁ mayan"ti.
sn2.4:3: "Cattāro loke pajjotā,pañcamettha na vijjati;Divā tapati ādicco,rattimābhāti candimā.
sn2.4:4: Atha aggi divārattiṁ,tattha tattha pakāsati;Sambuddho tapataṁ seṭṭho,esā ābhā anuttarā"ti.
